mapper.select: select no, title, content, map_content, writer, cover_image, is_share, end_date, start_date, tag, view_cnt, like_cnt, register_date from D_diary where no = #{no}
select tag_name from( select tag_name, count(tag_name) from d_tag group by tag_name order by count(tag_name) desc) where rownum <= 5
select * from d_diary where no in ( select diary_no from d_like group by diary_no)
mapper.insert: insert into d_diary(no, title, content, map_content, writer, end_date, start_date, cover_image, is_share, tag, addr) values(d_diary_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{map_content}, #{writer}, #{end_date}, #{start_date}, #{cover_image, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{is_share}, #{tag}, #{addr} ) SELECT d_diary_seq.currval FROM dual
mapper.update: update d_diary set view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 where no = #{no}
update d_diary set like_cnt = like_cnt + 1 where no = #{no}
update d_diary set like_cnt = like_cnt - 1 where no = #{no}
